message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I believe in fairness. Let's split it evenly.
I see you want fairness, but I think I can do a bit better than that.
Fairness is important, but so is recognizing the value I bring. Let's meet in the middle.
You want to recognize the value you bring? I think my contributions are worth a bit more.
Alice, we're running out of time. I'm standing firm on this. It's a reasonable offer considering my position.
I understand we're running out of time, but I'm not willing to give up that much. This is as low as I'll go.
